# Introduction

[Click here](https://github.com/julianstanley/julianstanley.com/raw/master/content/resources/SIRF_2017.pdf)
to view my project proposal for the 2017 Scholars Independent Research Fellowship.

I proposed a systematic set of assays to uncover the role of TGF-B signaling in the regulation of oxidative stress resistance in *Caenorhabditis elegans*.
